name: @plgworks/unicache
description: UniCache is an NPM package that provides singleton interface and behavior for Memcached, Redis and In-memory caching. Easily interact or switch between them in minutes!

scripts.test: source test/env/inMemory.sh && nyc --silent --no-clean ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --recursive "./test/*.js" --exit  && source test/env/memcached.sh && nyc --silent --no-clean ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --recursive "./test/*.js" --exit && source test/env/redis.sh && nyc --silent --no-clean ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --recursive "./test/*.js" --exit && nyc report

author: PLG Works
